EmailTemplate.description: Send to contractors that are interested in our First Time Buyer Program
EmailTemplate.name: #1 Follow the Vinyl - First Time Buyer and Specialist
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Tyvek® ThermaWrap™ R5.0 First Time Buyers Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ Tyvek® ThermaWrap™ R5.0, a continuous breathable air, water and thermal protection wrap. Tyvek® ThermaWrap™ R5.0 offers all the benefits of the breathability and water management of DuPont™ Tyvek® plus an additional 1 ½” insulated batting that delivers an R-value of 5.0.
For more information, please visit our web page at www.thermawrapr5.tyvek.com
We are currently offering a First Time Purchase Program in support of Tyvek® ThermaWrap™ R5.0. Please Click Here for more information and the submission form.
We have an extensive network of Tyvek® Specialists trained to help with specifications, installation questions, and on-site consultation/training. DuPont certified Tyvek® specialists can assist with questions relating to water intrusion problems, proper flashing techniques and other installation questions you might have.
Your local Tyvek® Specialist is Steve Wyatt (267) 738-9615.
Sincerely,
{!Lead.LastModifiedBy} DuPont Building Innovations
